name: ARConfiguration.VideoFormat
desc: A video size and frame rate specification for use with an AR session.

items.name: var framesPerSecond: Int
items.desc: The rate at which the session captures video and provides AR frame information.

items.name: var imageResolution: CGSize
items.desc: The size, in pixels, of video images captured in the session.

items.name: var captureDevicePosition: AVCaptureDevice.Position
items.desc: The position of the capture device.

items.name: enum AVCaptureDevice.Position
items.desc: Constants that indicate the physical position of a capture device.

items.name: var captureDeviceType: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
items.desc: The camera that supplies the video format.
